description: Creates a cloudfront distribution to serve static files from your s3 bucket

default_page_file.description: The name of the existing s3 object in your bucket which will serve as the default page.

price_class.description: The cloudfront price class for this distribution. Can be PriceClass_All, PriceClass_200, or PriceClass_100

acm_cert_arn.description: The ACM certificate arn you wish to use to handle ssl (needed if you want https for your site)

domains.description: The domains which you want your cloudfront distribution to support.

links.description: The linked s3 buckets to attach to your cloudfront distribution (currently only supports one).
